title: Derpy Conga Download
description:
Derpy Conga game for free instantly and play pre-installed on SteamRIP
A physics-based puzzle-platformer about the importance of friendship Gather all your friends and take them on a journey to save their endangered planet Take their hand as you find them and form a conga line to be sure not to leave anyone behind but be careful: the longer the line, the harder to control. Clownfield 2042
On the other hand ( haha ), certain obstacles are easier to overcome when you have friends on your side. Derpy Conga is currently under development in the lovely city of Cologne , Germany. You can follow the development of the game on Twitter, or directly wishlist it to not forget about it <3.
